title: Rising storm 2 vietnam
notes: Game installs fine, but in order to play the game u need to install easy anti cheat and there is where the problem is, it dosen't want to install it

title: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
notes: Error: "File not found: EasyAntiCleat/Launcher/Settings.json" and fails to launch. Game runs under normal wine (when playing on EAC-insecure servers)

title: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
notes: Ignore the anticheat window given focus to the splash and set the steam launch parameters as: cd "/<YOUR STEAM DIR>/steamapps/common/Rising Storm 2/Binaries/Win64"; %command%

title: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
notes: Command from the other entry allows to run the game, but using server browser crashes it and if you pick automatch, it will work for a while until you get error that authentication failed and you are sent to server browser, which instantly crashes the game.

title: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
notes: Problem with EasyAntiCheat - game can't find Settings.json

title: Rising Storm 2: Vietnam
notes: Using the launch options "cd ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/"Rising Storm 2"/Binaries/Win64; %command%" bypasses anti-cheat error, but after showing the game's splash screen it crashes with "Init failure code 3: Connection to the Content Distribution Network failed! Curl code: 35".

Using the launch options "cd ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/common/"Rising Storm 2"/Binaries/Win64; %command%" bypasses anti-cheat error.
But only the tutorial can be played, the game crash in the server browser.
